name: Chicken and Turkey Marinade
author: emmaxwell
summary: A 24 hour marinade, guaranteed to please every time. Chicken or turkey is always moist, and tender. Use half of a recipe for a chicken, or the full recipe for a turkey of up to 25 pounds. Everyone will clamor for this recipe!!! Use the drippings from the pan to make gravy as usual. It is not necessary to strain drippings first.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons minced garlic, or to taste
directions: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, soy sauce, lemon juice, and mustard
Stir in chives, sage, oregano, parsley, thyme, garlic, paprika, and herb seasoning
Cover, and refrigerate for 30 minutes to allow flavors to blend before marinating your favorite meat
Place turkey or chicken in a 30 gallon plastic kitchen bag
Grasp the bag a few inches above the poultry, and press air from the bag
Rotate bag to coat turkey with the marinade
Marinate in the refrigerator 24 hours, repositioning the bag every 4 hours, or so
Remove poultry from bag before roasting, and transfer marinade to a saucepan
Boil marinade for a few minutes, then use to baste the turkey every 30 minutes, or so, while roasting
Discard any remaining marinade when turkey is done
